dmca.title: Case of Reverse Domain Name Hijacking Turns Against Unicom Systems
dmca.body:
Confidential Document UNICOM Systems, Inc. 12/19/01 Page 1

Dear Mr. [Recipient]:
UNICOM Systems, Inc. adopted and has used UNICOM for its computer software business for more than nineteen years. We are also the owner of United States trademark registration No.2308224 for UNICOM.

It has come to my attention that Unicom Systems Development is the registered owner of the domain name UNICOM.COM. My company
